Name: Zen Cube
About the game: Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun. The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.
